CmdLine: apt-get update -y &&     apt-get install  flex bison byacc unzip autoconf libtool-bin automake wget  gcc python perl pkg-config libglib2.0-dev libpcap-dev gtk2.0  -y &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

CmdLine: wget https://github.com/wireshark/wireshark/archive/master.zip &&     unzip master.zip && cd wireshark-master/ &&     ./autogen.sh && ./configure -with-gtk && make && make install
